desc: Great boost to BB gauge when taking and inflicting damage each turn

dictionary.lore: It is said that a heavily protected dark magic tome from the Bariura Empire demonstrated the secret technique needed to convert a demon stone into a true demon heart. Rumor has it that once this heart was produced by fusing multiple souls together, a dark sorcerer appeared once again. It was then subsequently used during the war against the gods.

name: Demon Heart
